name: Deploy Docusaurus (Preview + Production)

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
  workflow_dispatch: {}

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run build
      - uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: build
  deploy:
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' && 'github-pages-preview' || 'github-pages' }}
    steps:
      - id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
        with:
          preview: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' }}

# Deploy & Secrets

## GitHub Settings
- Enable GitHub Pages (Build and deployment: GitHub Actions)
- Repository: {{org}}/{{repo}}

## Secrets (optional)
- `GA_ID`: Google Analytics (gtag) ID (e.g. G-XXXX)
- `ALGOLIA_APP_ID`, `ALGOLIA_API_KEY`, `ALGOLIA_INDEX_NAME`: DocSearch credentials

## Workflows
- PR to main: Preview deploy (temporary)
- Push to main: Production deploy to GitHub Pages

## Versioning
- Create a version: `npx docusaurus docs:version {{version}}`
- Update `versions.json` if needed
